ygData.subject: Re: Dissappointed in EverQuest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Avron: I will help you anytime camp the GB.  I am only a 26 Wizard, but I camped the GB at lvl 24 with a good group and I had few full resists, now I
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Avron:

I will help you anytime camp the GB. I am only a 26 Wizard, but I camped the
GB at lvl 24 with a good group and I had few full resists, now I should be
able to hit everything there for 172. If you get a good group and one in
which I will get some exp (even just a little) Send me a tell!!!

Wizaro WrathCaster <Scarlet Horizon>
Solusek Ro

"Hey guys, I'm gonna med over by the zone to Lake Rathe, If you see the named
Cyclops, please give..................."
LOADING PLEASE WAIT
